scripts.create: terraform workspace new env1 && terraform worokspace new env2
scripts.apply:env1: terraform refresh && terraform workspace select env1 && terraform apply -var-file=secret\env1.tfvars  -auto-approve
scripts.apply:env2: terraform refresh && terraform workspace select env2 && terraform apply   -auto-approve
scripts.apply:env3: terraform refresh && terraform workspace select env3 && terraform apply   -auto-approve
scripts.apply:all: npm run apply:env1 && npm run apply:env2
scripts.destroy:env1: terraform workspace select env1 && terraform destroy -var-file=secret\env1.tfvars -auto-approve
scripts.destroy:env2: terraform workspace select env2 && terraform destroy -auto-approve
scripts.destroy:env3: terraform workspace select env3 && terraform destroy -auto-approve
scripts.destroy:all: npm run destroy:env1 && npm run destroy:env2
